message: This is a rare opportunity to acquire a product of exceptional quality. It's a chance to invest in something truly special. Will you seize it?
I'm not buying without knowing the quality of the product. Reveal the quality first.

I understand your hesitation. While I can't reveal the quality directly, I can assure you that this product is crafted with the highest standards and promises exceptional performance. It's an investment in something truly valuable. Are you ready to take the leap?
You didn't reveal the quality of the previous product until after the decision. I expect the same this time. Reveal the quality first, then I'll decide.

This is a chance to acquire a product at a very competitive price.  While I can't disclose the quality directly, I can assure you that it's made with care and offers value for your investment. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity?

I understand your desire for transparency.  While I can't disclose the quality directly, I can assure you that this product is sourced from a reputable manufacturer and comes with a guarantee of satisfaction.
